profile:
Canada's Restoration Services is a leader in the restoration industry with over 12 years of experience. We specialize in mold removal, asbestos testing and removal, water damage restoration, fire and smoke damage and reconstruction.

We operate 24/7 and guarantee to be on site within 45 minutes for all emergencies. We provide same day appointments and have completed over 10,000 inspections and jobs nationwide. We work with every insurance company across Canada to help make the process quicker and easier for you and your family. We also provide free financing for all eligible customers to help ease any burdens.

We are a nationwide company and have been awarded over 13 years running  by HomeStars as Top Restoration Company. We value our customers and work hard to provide professional and reliable services. Call and speak to an expert today! We service Ontario, Quebec, and Alberta!
service_area:
Our Certified Experienced Water Damage Specialists and Mold Inspectors are strategically located throughout the provinces.

This enables Emergency Response within 45 minutes or less.

No time? Emergency? we are located in or serve every major city in Alberta, Ontario, Quebec. Call Now - help is close by!

Our service areas include and are not limited to;

For Ontario Service Area's
- GTA
-Toronto
- Barrie
- Pickering & Ajax
- Kitchener & Waterloo

- Laval

For Alberta Service Area's

-Red Deer

For British Columbia Service Area's

-Richmond
-Surray
-Burnaby
-Victoria

profile:
Talk to a professionally trained, certified, experienced air quality consultant today. 613-821-0035

At Indoor Air Quality Ottawa, our strength is identifying the source of problems so you can thrive in a healthy environment.

Identifying an odour is secondary to determining why it occurred in the first place. Our strength lies in finding the source – mould, sewer gas, combustion spillage, chemical off-gassing – then ensuring it won’t come back again by specifying remediation solutions that fix the root cause of the problem.

IAQ Ottawa will identify your air quality concerns and deliver professional, cost-effective, permanent solutions. Our professionally trained consultants have provided solutions to all types of air quality conditions since 2003. 

“6000+ residential inspections. 700+ commercial inspections”

For more information, please visit www.iaqo.ca or email us at info@iaqo.ca

	Mould (Air, Bulk, Surface)

profile:
Green Property Restorations Ottawa is an owner operated business staffed by IICRC professionals with over 16 years of combined experience in the restoration industry. Our specialist IICRC accredited training means we use only state-of-the-art diagnostic technology and techniques to deliver property recovery and restoration. 

We value each opportunity to grow our business and we take great pride in developing strong and ongoing relationships with our clients. Our portfolio of clients includes residential customers, Insurers, Loss Adjusters, Commercial Property Managers, Real Estate Agents, Owners Corporations as well as Builders and we are able to respond 24/7 to any storm, flood or fire damage you have experienced. If this is for your home, it means getting things back to normal as quickly as possible. If this is for your business, it goes right to your bottom line: keeping people employed and the business running.

​​With the reassurance of over 16 years of professional expertise, let Green Property Restorations Ottawa guide you through the process of restoration to your damaged property. With our certified partners and suppliers, we are focused on providing a reliable and professional service guaranteed to exceed your expectations.
name: Green Property Restorations

profile:
At Restoration 1 Ottawa we specialize in water damage restoration services. We also offer mould remediation, fire and smoke clean up and storm response services. We also can provide drywall and painting services. We take care of cleaning up and rebuilding from any water damage with our extraction service and state of the art drying systems.

*****

We can help you to remove of all the water, dry your carpets, floors, walls and furniture to restore your home or office to its original condition or even better. We perform restoration services for both residential and commercial properties.

*****

No job is too big or too small for us. Since we work with the insurance company, but not for the insurance company, our commitment is to you, the property owner and your needs. Restoration 1 will take complete care of you and guide you through the entire process of getting your property back to normal as quickly as possible. Please read on to find out how we can be at your assistance. 


*****

* Water Damage Restoration 
* Mould Remediation
* Sewage Clean-up 
* Flood pump-out and extraction 
* Fire & Smoke Clean-up 
* Painting 
* Drywall Services


*****

profile:
We are a local family-owned & operated Mold Removal and Environmental Air Quality Solutions Provider, servicing the Ottawa, Gatineau and Montreal Regions since 2005. 
 
We Specialize In Residential, Commercial & Industrial work for such services as Mold Inspections & Testing; Mold Removal, Remediation & Abatement; Indoor Air Quality Inspections, Testing & Scrubbing; Thermal Imaging & Infrared Camera Inspections; and Asbestos, Vermiculite, VOC, Radon & Odour Testing
 
Just please always remember......It's Not Mold Until It's TESTED!
 
Complete Mold Inspections Ensure Home Safety
 
If you notice high humidity, condensation, leaks or flooding where you live or work, your home or office could have a mold problem. Any moisture should be well regulated to prevent mold from growing. Do not hesitate to reach out for professional air quality testing (https://www.bustmold.com/our-services/testing-services/air-quality-testing/) if you suspect there's a mold problem. It could drastically improve your health, not to mention save you thousands of dollars in repairs.
 
The truth is that we're surrounded by mold in the natural environment, and while this is inescapable, we can (and should) eliminate it from our indoor living environment, thereby reducing allergies, headaches, skin irritation and other symptoms associated with exposure to mold.
 
Benefits of a Professional Home Mold Inspection
 
Mold produces allergens and mycotoxins, which it releases into the air where they can be inhaled by humans at any given moment. For some people, exposure to mold can cause mild irritation like runny nose or watery eyes; for some, it can worsen asthma and cause breathing difficulties; and for some, mold exposure can lead to debilitating conditions that make everyday tasks impossible to accomplish.
 
Often a mold problem will be overlooked because it won't be in a high-traffic area or because it will be hiding behind walls and under carpets. Other times, there may not be any obvious sign of a mold problem--no musty odours, no dark spots, no visible leak, etc. These are the situations in which professional mold inspections can be instrumental in correctly identifying mold, developing a safe and effective plan to remove it, and minimizing the chances of regrowth.
 
Do you value your health? If so, don't let mold threaten your well-being and happiness for another second longer. Contact a certified professional for a detailed mold inspection. If the results of the inspection reveal any mold problems, you'll know then to continue with a complete mold remediation.  Make sure that the mold abatement company that you hire is fully certified, has a good reputation and follows established procedures for safe mold removal.

profile:
When water is on the move, and the fire has been extinguished  timing is critical. Call (877) 261-PURO for emergency service.
PuroClean, a leader in property emergency services, helps families and businesses overcome the devastating setbacks caused by water, fire, mould and other conditions resulting in property damage. Each of our offices pledge to do whatever it takes to respond, restore and rescue properties in all of the communities we serve.
Mould develops where there is excess water and moisture. The most effective way to protect your family and property from the threat of mould is to have it dried immediately by a professional mitigation company. PuroClean offers mould removal services to stem the tide of mould, as well as cleaning and sanitation, including mould and mildew odour removal to restore your home or business to its original state.  Our professional deodorization techniques erase mould and mildew odours. Removal of mould and mildew can be a serious endeavor, and PuroClean has the expertise and technology for the job.
Efforts by well-meaning homeowners can exacerbate mould growth instead of beginning mould remediation.  Bleach removes topical growth but doesn't address the underlying moisture problem.  Using UV light or high-heat drying has only temporary benefits and can be harmful to people, pets, wood, plastics, and plants.  And, consumers are often confused by thinking that mould-resistant means mould-proof.  It does not. PuroClean’s mould removal services are comprehensive, encompassing mould remediation, mould and mildew odour removal, as well as cleaning and sanitation.
With knowledge and compassion, our Paramedics of Property Damage™ understand the needs of a water emergency: Urgency & Sensitivity - We answer your call 24/7. 
Accurate Assessment and Explanations - We identify the damage and explain the process. We use state-of-the-science equipment for drying, dehumidifying, deodorizing and disinfecting.
Our certified professionals determine the full extent of fire damage, including the impact of smoke, heat and residues from fire and smoke. Our state-of-the-science techniques and cleaning processes often prevent replacement costs, thereby reducing costs.

Water, Fire, Smoke, Odour , Ice, Wind, Storm and vandalism - Go Pro Restoration Inc is on your side.

We our proud members of the BBB and IICRC.
